dNewComment module¶

dNewComment.getAssignedTicketList(username)¶

Obtains a sorted list of the identifiers of the user’s assigned tickets.

Parameters:username (String) – Username of the user to get its assigned tickets
Returns:Integer List
dNewComment.addComment(text, username, idTicket)¶

Adds a comment in the database.

Parameters:
  • text (String) – Text of the comment to be added
  • username (String) – Username of the comment writer
  • idTicket (Integer) – Identifier of the ticket that owns the comment
